skills.skill: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Security Controls
Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance (GRC) Tool
Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA) Criteria
Enterprise Mission Assurance Support Service (eMASS) Tool

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Veterans Affairs (VA) in discovering and mitigating cybersecurity risks and understand the VA’s authorization policies.
Collaborate with team members, system owners, and ISSOs to execute system authorization requirements and duties.
Facilitate meetings, analyze authorization documents, and associated artifacts against authorization requirements to identify gaps.
Translate security concepts into actionable implementable solution recommendations for clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in CS, IT, Mathematics, or Engineering and 5+ years of experience with IT
